Description: I upgraded Windows 11 23H2 on the official website. When I entered the key at the key entry step, it upgraded to the professional version. Now I need to activate Windows, but I don't remember my original key. I bought the computer at a physical store and can't find the packaging. How can I revert to the home version now?
Title: How to revert from Windows 11 Pro to Home Edition after upgrading to Pro?
EnhancedContent: I upgraded Windows 11 23H2 on the official website. When I entered the key at the key entry step, it upgraded to the professional version. Now I need to activate Windows, but I don't remember my original key. I bought the computer at a physical store and can't find the packaging. How can I revert to the home version now?
Author: DaxxonFoster
